markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Vision Assistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=1670)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 70</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
People with low vision use a number of different items to aid with correction. These items are made from a variety of materials and typically include glass lenses that help refocus light toward the user's eye.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Vision Assistance
text: Vision Assistance Source Grand Bazaar pg. 70 People with low vision use a number of different items to aid with correction. These items are made from a variety of materials and typically include glass lenses that help refocus light toward the user's eye.
